      • interpolate

        public static float interpolate(float start,
                                float end,
                                float slices,
                                float n)
        Find an interpolated value given extremes of the range across which to interpolate, the number of steps to divide that range into and the step of the range to find.
        Parameters:
        start - beginning (min) of the range
        end - end (max) of the range
        slices - slices to divide range into
        n - slice desired from interpolation
        Returns:
        interpolated value

      • setCurrCrop

        public void setCurrCrop(EnumFood crop)

      • rateTileForCrop

        public CropZoneData.EnumCropZone rateTileForCrop(EnumFood crop)
                                          throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Rates tile's suitability for a particular crop.
        Parameters:
        crop - crop for which we want rating (wheat, corn, rice, or soy)
        Returns:
        EnumCropZone (IDEAL, ACCEPTABLE, or POOR)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if called with argument EnumFood.OTHER_CROPS, will throw an exception because OTHER_CROPS required climate varies by country; rating cannot be calculated using crop alone.

      • rateTileForOtherCrops

        public CropZoneData.EnumCropZone rateTileForOtherCrops(CropClimateData otherCropsData)
        Rate tile's suitability for a particular country's other crops.
        Parameters:
        otherCropsData - a country's otherCropsData object
        Returns:
        EnumCropZone (IDEAL, ACCEPTABLE, or POOR)

      • getTileYieldPercent

        public double getTileYieldPercent(EnumFood crop,
                                  CropZoneData.EnumCropZone zone)
        Get percent of country's yield for crop tile will yield, base on its zone rating and current use
        Parameters:
        crop - crop in question
        zone - tile's zone for that crop
        Returns:
        percent of country's yield tile can yield
